PopulationStatistics
public
PopulationStatistics
NeatPopulationStatistics

Population statistics.

Properties
BestGenomeIndex
public int BestGenomeIndex { get; set }

Index of the best genome in the population's genome list.

BestFitness
public FitnessInfo BestFitness { get; set }

FitnessInfo for the current best genome.

MeanFitness
public double MeanFitness { get; set }

Mean of the genome primary fitness for the current population.

BestFitnessHistory
public CircularBufferWithStats BestFitnessHistory { get; set }

A trailing history of best fitness scores at each of the previous N generations.  This object can also provide a mean over the historical fitness scores, thus providing a moving average value.

BestComplexity
public double BestComplexity { get; set }

Complexity of the current best genome.

MeanComplexity
public double MeanComplexity { get; set }

Mean genome complexity for the current population.

MaxComplexity
public double MaxComplexity { get; set }

Max genome complexity for the current population.

MeanComplexityHistory
public CircularBufferWithStats MeanComplexityHistory { get; set }

A trailing history of mean genome complexity at each of the previous N generations.  This object can also provide a mean over the historical values, thus providing a moving average value.
